thread.title: Report: Refugees From America Fleeing To Canada After Trump’s Immigration Order
thread.title_full: Report: Refugees From America Fleeing To Canada After Trump’s Immigration Order

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Report: Refugees From America Fleeing To Canada After Trump’s Immigration Order
text:
07:46pm February 6, 2017 Do you like this article? 
A few weeks back, Candian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau offered to take any refugees who don’t feel welcome in the United States. 
Apparently, refugees in America are already taking him up on his offer. 
From Yahoo News : Refugees in the United States fearing a worsening climate of xenophobia in the wake of a divisive U.S. presidential campaign are flocking to Canada in growing numbers. Manitoba’s Welcome Place refugee agency helped 91 claimants between Nov. 1 and Jan. 25 – more than the agency normally sees in a year. Most braved the freezing prairie winter to walk into Canada. Self-deporting? Interesting but also unnecessary. You can blame the media for this one. They have created a ridiculous narrative that Trump is anti-refugee and anti-immigrant. He’s neither. He didn’t impose a “Muslim” ban. He imposed a temporary freeze on immigration from 7 countries identified as potential national security risks by the Obama Administration. Increased vetting is not the same thing as a “Muslim ban” or a “travel ban”. The media knows that but they have pushed the lie anyway. LIKE this article?
